title: Config panel cannot be brought back - Nightly 1.77.2
author: pauldurham
body_snippet:
Once the Config Panel has been closed I don't see a "View" option to bring it back.  Only a Layout Reset seems to bring it back.

## Expected Behavior
I expect to see a View option to enable the Config Panel.

## Current Behavior
Only a Layout Reset re-enables the Config Panel.

## Context
It makes changing the layout tricky.

## Your Environment
Windows 10 Enterprise 64-bit 20H2.
